result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
2:08 PM Defendant Romone J McKinney in court.  Prosecuting attorney Lexi Keyes in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant has applied for SPD but was denied.  Defendant given information regarding court appointed attorney and private counsel.
Status conference scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Status conference on December 2, 2022 at 09:30 am.

3:06 PM Prosecuting attorney Trisha L Simmons in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Romone J McKinney in court. Defendant is planning to hire a private attorney.  Defendant advised of right to attorney.  Defendant given information regarding SPD and court appointed attorney.  Case rescheduled.
Status conference scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on October 31, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on August 15, 2022 at 02:40 pm.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall complete the booking/fingerprinting process if required. 
- Defendant shall not be at any Dollar Tree store in Dane County. 
Parties stipulated to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing. 
Trial Judge - Br 12

10:55 AM Defendant appeared.  Hector Al-Homsi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Status conference scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 02:40 pm.
